com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheap
Class OffHeapPayloadArrayList

java.lang.Object
  com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheap.OffHeapPayloadArrayList
All Implemented Interfaces:
OffHeapAddressable, OffHeapDisposable, OffHeapPayloadAddressable
public class OffHeapPayloadArrayList
extends Object
implements OffHeapPayloadAddressable, OffHeapDisposable

Implementation of off-heap header-payload array-list of long using OffHeapMemory. Memory block for each index contains long header anb byte[] payload. Memory area will be allocated another time and copied on elements adding. This class doesn't support elements removing. get(long) and set(long, long, byte[]) access operations indexes are checked using assert keyword (indexes between size and capacity will be rejected). Default implementation uses sun.misc.Unsafe, with all operations guarded with assert keyword. With assertions enabled in runtime (-ea java switch) AssertionError will be thrown on illegal index access. Without assertions illegal index will crash JVM. Array won't be zeroed after creation (will contain garbage by default). Allocated memory may be freed manually using free() (thread-safe and may be called multiple times) or it will be freed after OffHeapLongArray will be garbage collected.

Author:
alexkasko Date: 3/4/13
